## Bio

I am currently a Master student in **Statistics, Econometrics** at the IAE of Nantes. My interest in **environmental** **data** in general and **marine** **data** in particular, led me to specialize in **time series** and **machine learning.** I am passionate about the analysis of large amounts of data and I am convinced that the use of statistical methods and machine learning can help solve current environmental problems. I have the ambition to develop my skills to make a positive impact on our **planet**. I believe that my knowledge of statistics, econometrics, and data analysis will be a valuable asset to the environmental companies and organizations I wish to work for.
